title: Lagging during Rift
body:
Ok so i'm at my wit's end. i have tried so many different things to stop the lag. I can play ARAM all day will no problems but anytime I try to play Rift or anything other than ARAM  I will start to lag at the 10 min mark or so. I start out great but then i will get unplayable lag. I never have anything else running and i have tried all the different setting and changing the compatibility, I just don't know what else it can be. As I said ARAM runs fine. anyother suggestions would be great thank you.

Router:
Belkin

Comp specs:
Asus F550v
Windows 10 Home( i play on windows 7 compat)
Intel core i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz 2592 Mhz 4 cores
Ram: 8 GB
Card: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 950M

replies.body: When you say you start to lag, is this an increase in FPS or ping? Or do you actually see any visible increase in those numbers at all? The we I approach fixing this is pretty dependant on what exactly is going on, so let me know a little more about if this is an FPS or Ping issue and I should be able to help!
so i do seem to have a drop in FPS but i have done everything suggested to fix it. not sure what is left to do other then change hardware
